description: Returns details about the sync status for a repository. A repository sync uses Git sync to push and pull changes from your remote repository.

parameters.name: Branch
parameters.description: The branch of the repository link for the requested repository sync status.

parameters.name: RepositoryLinkId
parameters.description: The repository link ID for the requested repository sync status.

parameters.name: SyncType
parameters.description: The sync type of the requested sync status.

nested_items.name: LatestSync
nested_items.description: The status of the latest sync returned for a specified repository and branch.

nested_items.name: StartedAt
nested_items.description: The start time of a specific sync attempt.

nested_items.name: Status
nested_items.description: The status of a specific sync attempt. The following are valid statuses:
INITIATED - A repository sync attempt has been created and will begin soon.
IN_PROGRESS - A repository sync attempt has started and work is being done to reconcile the branch.
SUCCEEDED - The repository sync attempt has completed successfully.
FAILED - The repository sync attempt has failed.
QUEUED - The repository sync attempt didn't execute and was queued.

nested_items.name: Events
nested_items.description: The events associated with a specific sync attempt.

nested_items.name: Event
nested_items.description: A description of a repository sync event.

nested_items.name: ExternalId
nested_items.description: The ID for a repository sync event.

nested_items.name: Time
nested_items.description: The time that a repository sync event occurred.

nested_items.name: Type
nested_items.description: The event type for a repository sync event.
